Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway/Overland Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lankshire Parkway and Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway continues to the north and south, intersected by Overland Drive, running east and west. Overland Drive runs through much of the wealthy residental estates in town. To the east is the notorious Mansion of Natasha de Allisk. To the west, you can get to both the Iilandi Family Estate and the Khelleva Stables. On the northeast, you can see the corner of the Necropolis. Lankshire Parkway forms the western end of the Necropolis.
